actions.name: AddTagsToStream
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream. Each stream can have up to 10 tags

actions.name: CreateStream
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Amazon Kinesis stream

actions.name: DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
actions.description: Grants permission to decrease the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream

actions.name: DeleteStream
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a stream and all its shards and data

actions.name: DeregisterStreamConsumer
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream

actions.name: DescribeLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the shard limits and usage for the account

actions.name: DescribeStream
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the specified stream

actions.name: DescribeStreamConsumer
actions.description: Grants permission to get the description of a registered stream consumer

actions.name: DescribeStreamSummary
actions.description: Grants permission to provide a summarized description of the specified Kinesis data stream without the shard list

actions.name: DisableEnhancedMonitoring
actions.description: Grants permission to disables enhanced monitoring

actions.name: EnableEnhancedMonitoring
actions.description: Grants permission to enable enhanced Kinesis data stream monitoring for shard-level metrics

actions.name: GetRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to get data records from a shard

actions.name: GetShardIterator
actions.description: Grants permission to get a shard iterator. A shard iterator expires five minutes after it is returned to the requester

actions.name: IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
actions.description: Grants permission to increase the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream

actions.name: ListShards
actions.description: Grants permission to list the shards in a stream and provides information about each shard

actions.name: ListStreamConsumers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the stream consumers registered to receive data from a Kinesis stream using enhanced fan-out, and provides information about each consumer

actions.name: ListStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to list your streams

actions.name: ListTagsForStream
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream

actions.name: MergeShards
actions.description: Grants permission to merge two adjacent shards in a stream and combines them into a single shard to reduce the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data

actions.name: PutRecord
actions.description: Grants permission to write a single data record from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream

actions.name: PutRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to write multiple data records from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream in a single call (also referred to as a PutRecords request)

actions.name: RegisterStreamConsumer
actions.description: Grants permission to register a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromStream
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified Kinesis data stream. Removed tags are deleted and cannot be recovered after this operation successfully completes

actions.name: SplitShard
actions.description: Grants permission to split a shard into two new shards in the Kinesis data stream, to increase the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data

actions.name: StartStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or update server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream

actions.name: StopStreamEncryption
actions.description: Grants permission to disable server-side encryption for a specified stream

actions.name: SubscribeToShard
actions.description: Grants permission to listen to a specific shard with enhanced fan-out

actions.name: UpdateShardCount
actions.description: Grants permission to update the shard count of the specified stream to the specified number of shards

actions.name: UpdateStreamMode
actions.description: Grants permission to update the capacity mode of the data stream
